transcript:
Agent: Hello, is this Mr. Johnson?
Customer: Yes, it is. Who's calling?
Agent: My name is Emily, and I'm calling from GreenTech Solutions. We specialize in energy-efficient products.
Customer: Okay, what can you do for me?
Agent: We've recently launched a new smart thermostat that can help you save up to 30% on your energy bills.
Customer: That sounds interesting. I've been looking for ways to reduce my bills.
Agent: Exactly. Our thermostat is easy to install and can be controlled remotely through your smartphone.
Customer: How much does it cost?
Agent: The price starts at $249, but we're currently offering a discount for first-time customers.
Customer: What kind of discount?
Agent: You can get 10% off the original price, bringing it down to $224.
Customer: That's still a bit pricey for me. What kind of warranty do you offer?
Agent: We offer a 2-year warranty and dedicated customer support.
Customer: Okay, I'm interested. Can you send me more information about the product?
Agent: Absolutely. I'll send you an email with all the details and a link to purchase.
Customer: Great, thank you. I'll take a look and get back to you.
Agent: Sounds good, Mr. Johnson. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Customer: You're welcome, Emily. Have a good day.
Agent: You too, Mr. Johnson. Bye.
